00043 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDS
00044 
00045 #include <obd_class.h>
00046 #include <lprocfs_status.h>
00047 #include <lustre_mds.h>
00048 
00049 #include "mdd_internal.h"
00050 
00051 struct thandle *mdd_trans_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00052                                  struct mdd_device *mdd)
00053 {
00054         return mdd_child_ops(mdd)->dt_trans_create(env, mdd->mdd_child);
00055 }
00056 
00057 int mdd_trans_start(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_device *mdd,
00058                     struct thandle *th)
00059 {
00060         return mdd_child_ops(mdd)->dt_trans_start(env, mdd->mdd_child, th);
00061 }
00062 
00063 int mdd_trans_stop(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_device *mdd,
00064                    int result, struct thandle *handle)
00065 {
00066         handle->th_result = result;
00067         return mdd_child_ops(mdd)->dt_trans_stop(env, mdd->mdd_child, handle);
00068 }
